sentences.en: All the parties pay lip service to environmental issues.
sentences.cn: 对环境问题，各方都是口惠而实不至。

sentences.en: Blood from his cut lip trickled over his chin.
sentences.cn: 血从他划伤的嘴唇涌出顺着下巴往下流。

sentences.en: He chewed his lower lip nervously.
sentences.cn: 他紧张地咬着下嘴唇。

sentences.en: He curled his upper lip in a show of scepticism.
sentences.cn: 他撇嘴表示怀疑。

sentences.en: He had a split lip and an eye that wouldn't open properly.
sentences.cn: 他长着兔唇，一只眼睛无法正常睁开。

sentences.en: Her lip quivered and then she started to cry.
sentences.cn: 她嘴唇微微一颤就哭了起来。

sentences.en: His upper lip was flat, but the lower one sagged.
sentences.cn: 他上唇扁平，下唇耷拉。

sentences.en: I must learn to bite my lip.
sentences.cn: 我必须学会不乱说话。

sentences.en: Marty kissed me right on the lips!
sentences.cn: 马蒂一下吻在我的嘴唇上！

sentences.en: Mary suggests using a neutral lip pencil.
sentences.cn: 玛丽建议用浅色唇线笔。

sentences.en: Matt opened the door with a smile on his lips.
sentences.cn: 马特开了门，嘴角挂着微笑。

sentences.en: she bit her lip to stop the rush of bitter words.
sentences.cn: 她咬紧嘴唇，强忍住没冲口说出尖刻的话。

sentences.en: She bit her lower lip.
sentences.cn: 她咬了咬下唇。

sentences.en: She had big eyes and full lips (= large and round lips ).
sentences.cn: 她眼睛大大的，嘴唇很丰满。

sentences.en: She had quite severe bruising and a cut lip.
sentences.cn: 她身上有严重的淤伤，嘴唇也破了。

sentences.en: She lip-synced to a Beatles song.
sentences.cn: 她对口形假唱一首披头士乐队的歌曲。

sentences.en: Stephen pursed his lips with distaste (= brought them together tightly into a small circle ).
sentences.cn: 斯蒂芬厌恶地噘起嘴唇。

sentences.en: The beginnings of a moustache showed on his upper lip.
sentences.cn: 他的上唇部位开始长胡子了。

sentences.en: The man's heavy moustache hid his upper lip completely.
sentences.cn: 那个男人浓密的髭须完全遮住了他的上唇。

sentences.en: With a lip pencil, outline lips and fill them in.
sentences.cn: 用唇线笔勾出双唇的轮廓，然后涂上唇膏。

words.tran_cn: 没有嘴唇的；（器皿等）无嘴的
用嘴唇接触；轻轻说出；溢出；吹奏（lip的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 咬紧嘴唇；压抑感情；抑制笑容；忍住不说
舐嘴唇（表示满意和渴望）
唇封；唇形密封；边缘密封

phrases.phrase: my (或 his 等) lips are sealed

phrases.tran_cn: 大家都在谈论的，大家都在传的 [亦作 on every lip]

trans.tran_cn: 嘴唇，（杯，壶等的）口，边缘，〈俚〉无理的回答，〈美〉律师
trans.tran_en: one of the two soft parts around your mouth where your skin is redder or darker
